header.title: counters

description.p: The purpose of the Counters application is to provide an Erlang API to mutable high performance counters.

section.title: DEPENDENCIES
section.p: The current counters implementation uses NIFs to interface atomic operations provided by an internal ERTS interface ethread.h.
